Package com.xebisco.yield.engine

Class GameHandler

java.lang.Object
com.xebisco.yield.engine.Engine
com.xebisco.yield.engine.GameHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class GameHandler extends Engine
It's the class that handles the game loop

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update(long last, long actual)
      Description copied from class: Engine
      "This function is called every time the game updates." The first parameter, `last`, is the time in milliseconds since the last update. The second parameter, `actual`, is the time in milliseconds the actual frame process began.
      Overrides:
      update in class Engine
      Parameters:
      last - The last time the update method was called.
      actual - The current time in milliseconds.
